name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an adversary leveraged a command and scripting interpreter to execute malicious scripts, leading to data exfiltration and critical file modifications.

action--f5b1d71f-4c6d-4e58-8ed3-8f5d7fef.name: Kill malicious process
action--f5b1d71f-4c6d-4e58-8ed3-8f5d7fef.description: Terminate any processes that are executing the malicious script.

action--2a95cbc8-24c2-4f69-ab68-1c9e1a1b.name: Isolate affected host
action--2a95cbc8-24c2-4f69-ab68-1c9e1a1b.description: Isolate the host from the network to prevent further data exfiltration.

action--7d0e83ed-1033-4af9-b8d3-ba0e6f59.name: No action needed
action--7d0e83ed-1033-4af9-b8d3-ba0e6f59.description: No suspicious process found; proceed with system scan.

commands.command: echo No action needed:  No suspicious process found; proceed with system scan.

action--c16c23c2-0e30-4646-b54c-7812e65e.name: Run full system scan
action--c16c23c2-0e30-4646-b54c-7812e65e.description: Perform a full system scan to identify any remaining threats.

while-condition--7e0d258c-45da-493a-b4fc.name: Check scan results loop
while-condition--7e0d258c-45da-493a-b4fc.description: Repeat the system scan until the system is clean.
